rooms.description: The entrance lobby features a traditional Chettinad welcome area with intricate wood carvings and stone accents, ensuring positive energy flow as per Vastu. North facing to invite auspicious energy.

An open-plan kitchen adjoining living and dining spaces in a seamless layout. The area incorporates natural lighting with strategically placed windows facing south to avoid harsh west sun exposure. Vastu alignment recommends placing the dining area towards the east.
The kitchen is designed in an open-plan format with modern appliances integrated seamlessly within traditional Chettinad aesthetics. The cooking zone is aligned to the south for heat management.
The master bedroom is positioned towards the southeast to enhance comfort and relaxation as per Vastu. It features a walk-in closet integrated within the space.
A guest bedroom placed on the north side for positive energy flow and minimal disturbance from traffic areas.
The bathroom is integrated within the master bedroom area with a separate ventilation window ensuring proper airflow in line with Vastu principles.
A dedicated swimming pool area is designed at the southwest corner of the plot to balance the energy and complement the overall aesthetic. The pool area features a surrounding deck.
The garage is located at the west side of the plot to accommodate two cars. It includes ample storage space and easy access from the main entrance.
